title: Hyrule Amino for Zelda Fans
description:
The largest social network just for Zelda fans.  Meet others like you and discuss your favorite game strategies, tips, tricks, and characters.  Share your thoughts and creations with a huge audience of likeminded people.  In the app you can:
CHAT with other fans and make new friends
VOTE on your favorite LoZ games and characters.
FIND and DISCUSS recommendations for challenging gameplay, improving your skills, and Zelda news from a community that knows Zelda better than anywhere else.
LEARN from and CONTRIBUTE to our Zelda catalog - an encyclopedia of all things LoZ.
